https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/pM83IWrjRP88kIKTKM20b7YVqNZ.jpg In the Austrian Alps have found the body of a young woman who died in a skiing accident eight years earlier. Dr. Marc Pelletier decides to return to the scene, as it is the brother of his ex-girlfriend. When he reach the ski resort, a dreadful avalanche buries all the people. Die Jahrhundertlawine
